interfaces

Class UserInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • interfaces.UserInterface

  • public class UserInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    A class which handles all input and output for the application.
    Author:
    Matthew Mulenga

        Returns:
        the int value read in
